title: Steampunk Watchface for Wear
description: Steampunk style watchface with options for color accents. The companion app inside android wear lets you customize your watchface and preview.★ Battery and Date indicator ★ Blue, Red and Green color options★ Tick and sweep second hand★ Toggle battery and date widgets visibility ★ Ambient modeSupport for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.INSTALL NOTES:After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps".
descriptionHTML:
Steampunk style watchface with options for color accents. The companion app inside android wear lets you customize your watchface and preview.

★ Battery and Date indicator
★ Blue, Red and Green color options
★ Tick and sweep second hand
★ Toggle battery and date widgets visibility
★ Ambient mode

Support for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.

INSTALL NOTES:

After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps".
comments: Nice but Would be better if it had some moving gears.
Has the detail and gloss most other faces don't have!
